alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 7:51PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Salt Lake and southeastern Davis Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 750 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Magna, or over West Valley City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, Taylorsville, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Millcreek, Kearns, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, East Millcreek, Canyon Rim, Oquirrh, Sugarhouse and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 301 and 313. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 110 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
